rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. Not all British citizens have a passport, so we're not sure exactly what action you'd like to see. We're not sure whether you'd like the Government to fund housing for all homeless British citizens, all homeless British and Irish citizens in the UK, or only for people who have a passport.  You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
